author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Madurai Mobile Phone Sellers’ Association has appealed to the Union government to regulate online trade as it affected retail traders. In a resolution passed at its meeting here on Friday, the association said that online trade affected the livelihood of thousands of persons who were dependent on retail selling of mobile phones.

The meeting, presided over by Kanagavel, urged the government not to allow corporate houses to open their direct selling outlets, which affected retail trade of mobile phones.
title: Mobile phone retailers oppose online trade
